channel.title: 履约 on Wahool对接接口
channel.description: Recent content in 履约 on Wahool对接接口

item.title: 履约订单
item.description: 说明 商家履约订单相关接口 分页查询商家未履约订单 BASIC Path: /seller/202405/fulfillment/fulfillment-orders/unfulfilled-list Method: GET REQUEST Query: name required desc example size NO 每页条数 默认 20，max 200 20 page NO 第几页 默认 1 1 RESPONSE Body: name type desc example code integer 响应状态码 200 message string 提示信息 success data object 数据包 |─data array 数据项 |─ object |─fulfillmentOrderNumber string 履约单号 1231154465 |─state integer 状态 0未发货 10已发货 9履约单已取消 0 |─address object 地址 |─consignee string 收件人姓名 hall |─phone string 联系电话 21111111111 |─address1 string 地址1 1234 amazon way |─address2 string 地址2 suite 123 |─city string 城市 Troy |─stateProvince string 州编码或者省份 MI |─postalCode string 邮编 48084 |─countryCode string 国家code US |─fulfillmentOrderItems array 履约单商品List |─ object |─sku string wahool Sku WU66ECPM8B |─sellerSku string 商家自己的Sku B0CQ4JNC58 |─quantity integer 商品数量 3 |─total integer 总条数 8 |─totalPage integer 总页数 1 |─size integer 分页大小 20 |─currentPage integer 当前页 1 locale integer localeDisplay string Response Demo: { "code": 200, "message": "success", "data": { "data": [ { "fulfillmentOrderNumber": "1231154465", "state": 0, "address": { "consignee": "hall", "phone": "21111111111", "address1": "1234 amazon way", "address2": "suite 123", "city": "Troy", "stateProvince": "MI", "postalCode": "48084", "countryCode": "US" }, "fulfillmentOrderItems": [ { "sku": "WU66ECPM8B", "sellerSku": "B0CQ4JNC58", "quantity": 3 } ] } ], "total": 8, "totalPage": 1, "size": 20, "currentPage": 1, "page": 1 }, "locale": 0, "localeDisplay": "" } 查询履约单明细 BASIC
